hadiths.text: It has been narrated on the authority of Abu Huraira that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:No two such persons shall be together in Hell as if one of them is such that his presence hurts the other. It was asked: Messenger of Allah, who are they? He said: A believer who killed a disbeliever and (then) kept to the right path

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ قَتَلَ كَافِرًا ثُمَّ سَدَّدَ
chapter.eng-name: One who kills a disbeliever then keeps to the right path
